Episodes.Title: Memo from the Dark Side
Episodes.Plot: The body of a young war veteran is found in a parking garage and the murder is connected to a law professor who used to work for the Department of Justice.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.

Episodes.Title: Just a Girl in the World
Episodes.Plot: A crime scene investigator is murdered in her apartment. Her fiance is suspected, but then a journalist is attacked and DNA is found at the scene that links this crime to the murder.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.

Episodes.Title: Great Satan
Episodes.Plot: Detectives Lupo and Bernard investigate when an aspiring musician is found dead. A bag of cash leads them to multiple suspects.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.

Episodes.Title: Reality Bites
Episodes.Plot: A mother of ten adopted special needs children is murdered. The day after her murder, her husband appears on reality TV.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.

Episodes.Title: Dignity
Episodes.Plot: A doctor who performs late-term abortions is murdered in church. The case falls apart for Cutter when Rubirosa is touched by an abortion nurse's testimony.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.

Episodes.Title: Human Flesh Search Engine
Episodes.Plot: Bernard becomes the target of a dangerous website that is partly responsible for a homicide the detectives are investigating
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.

Episodes.Title: Boy Gone Astray
Episodes.Plot: When a young woman is found dead in her apartment, a few tell-tale signs quickly lead Detectives Cyrus Lupo (Jeremy Sisto) and Kevin Bernard (Anthony Anderson) to believe that the killer was not after her wealth.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.

Episodes.Title: Doped
Episodes.Plot: A deadly drunk-driving car accident brings Detectives Cyrus Lupo and Kevin Bernard to the scene when a suspicious nasal spray is found. After the medical examiner realizes the nasal spray is a powerful anesthetic that could easily disorient its user, the detectives become suspicious of the victim's boss, Zach Marshall
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.

Episodes.Title: For the Defense
Episodes.Plot: A case that begins as a search for a missing witness spirals into a murder conspiracy with ADA Connie Rubirosa caught in the middle.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.

Episodes.Title: Shotgun
Episodes.Plot: When an elderly man defends his shop from an armed robbery, Detectives Kevin Bernard and Cyrus Lupo suspect that this incident could have been an inside job. After further investigation, the detectives discover that the mugging might have been a scare tactic for a shakedown.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.

Episodes.Title: Fed
Episodes.Plot: A community organizer who was working on voter registration is found dead with the word "FED" written on his chest. The detectives initially suspect an anti-government motive for the murder, but the case gets more complicated when they learn that the victim was secretly gathering incriminating information about the organization he worked for.

Episodes.Title: Blackmail
Episodes.Plot: A freelance journalist is murdered. The detectives find a connection between her and a talk show host who has had a series of workplace affairs.

Episodes.Title: Steel-Eyed Death
Episodes.Plot: When a family of four is found murdered in their home, Detectives Cyrus Lupo (Jeremy Sisto) and Kevin Bernard (Anthony Anderson) discover that the deaths may be related to the deceased teenage daughters troubled friend, Bonnie.

Episodes.Title: Boy On Fire
Episodes.Plot: When detectives Cyrus Lupo (Jeremy Sisto) and Kevin Bernard (Anthony Anderson) come upon the burning body of Cesar (guest star Noel Rodriguez), a sixteen-year-old charter school student from a bad neighborhood, they begin to question his young mentee Moses (guest star Aaron Shaw), who was the last person to see him alive.

Episodes.Title: Brilliant Disguise
Episodes.Plot: A young woman is found murdered in a hotel and the evidence leads to a medical student.

Episodes.Title: Innocence
Episodes.Plot: A man is convicted of a hate crime for allegedly killing a gay man, but a group called the Innocence Coalition is determined to clear his name.

Episodes.Title: Four Cops Shot
Episodes.Plot: The debate rages over how to treat an informant who shot and killed four police officers. However, did one of the officers try to put undue pressure on him to help catch a dangerous criminal?

Episodes.Title: Brazil
Episodes.Plot: When an environmental scientist, Dr. Oscar Silva, is poisoned during a global warming symposium, Detectives Cyrus Lupo and Kevin Bernard initially suspect competitors from Dr. Silva's field of study. It is soon discovered that Dr. Silva is involved in a messy custody battle with his wife?s ex-husband, Phillip Shoemaker and the focus of the investigation quickly shifts to the victim?s family. Meanwhile, the case becomes personal for Cutter as it stirs up unpleasant memories from his own past.

Episodes.Title: Crashers
Episodes.Plot: When the body of a model is found burning in an alley, Detectives Lupo and Bernard search for her killer.
Episodes.GuestStars: Sabina Gadecki, Tony Roberts, Kathy Baker

Episodes.Title: The Taxman Cometh
Episodes.Plot: When a young heiress dies of an apparent drug overdose, Lupo and Bernard begin to suspect her cousin, whose inheritance increased after her death.

Episodes.Title: Immortal
Episodes.Plot: A man's double life is discovered after he is stabbed to death.

Episodes.Title: Love Eternal
Episodes.Plot: A reality TV crew finds a dead body locked in a dog cage.

Episodes.Title: Rubber Room
Episodes.Plot:
Series finale.
A terrorist threatens students.
